name: Bynu
description:
Boing boing, goes the byun. Try to climb as high as you can!

A smol and chill climber  by CuddleFish and Xananax for the Bynu Jam.

We made this to prove the following points:

  • Buyns are malleable.
How to Play:
  1. Move the bell with your mouse/a finger
  2. When you release it, the buyn will try to leap towards it
  3. Make the bnuy climb!
  4. You can jump through platforms, no need to go around them
  5. The byyn can jump pretty high, don't hesitate to drag the bell high up!

The game works well in a mobile browser, try it out if that's your jam, no need to download the Android package
